attributes.action: Enforce anti-racism and equality activists into workplaces across the UK
attributes.additional_details: Because people need to learn about how less than a lifetime ago, there were black slaves being tortured and raped just because of the colour of their skin, now that everybody should be given the same opportunity to be who they want to be and do what they want to do, there should be policies in place that see to those who are racist pay the price and face consequences, but we can only do that if we establish a platform we can all stand on tol of to understand what equality actually is.
attributes.background: Employ experienced members of the UK society who are qualified in social and political services to begin a 16 week programme in every workplace, that enables everybody to understand about people of varying backgrounds and skin colours being simply from different parts of the world.
